text: An elastomeric respirator is a respirator with changeable filters. It is also made of rubber and plastic. It can be used many times. They can be big or small. The big one that covers the eyes is called a full-face elastomeric respirator. The small one that covers the nose and mouth is called a half-mask elastomeric respirator. Elastomeric respirators are usually used by industry. ==References== ==Related pages== *Fume hood *Gas mask *N95 Category:Protective clothing Category:Headgear
title: Elastomeric respirator
